colors.name: AZ blue
colors.description: This colour is used in the logo and as main brand colour.

colors.name: Light blue
colors.description: This colour is used to indicate links and interactive elements.

colors.name: Black
colors.description: This colour is used for all of the text content on the site, instead of black.

colors.name: Orange
colors.description: This colour represents dialogue, opinion and community content.

colors.name: Yellow
colors.description: This colour is used for subtle highlights & drawing attention to certain sections and should be used sparingly.

colors.name: Turquoise
colors.description: This colour is used to represent dossier pages.

colors.name: Red
colors.description: This colour indicates live events and breaking news.

colors.name: Dark grey
colors.description: This colour is for contextual tags, quotes, captions and other small details.

colors.name: Medium grey
colors.description: This colour is for backgrounds that need to stand out.

colors.name: Light grey
colors.description: This colour is used to infer subtle backgrounds on pieces of content.

colors.name: Very light grey
colors.description: This colour is used to infer subtle backgrounds on pieces of content.
